name: Ontology Model w/ Pop and Vax States
description: Ontology Model w/ Population and Vaccine-Unit States. File created by Patrick based ontology created by Nelson

states.name: Pop
states.description: Compartment of individuals in a human population

states.name: Vaccine
states.description: Compartment of vaccine doses available for use in a vaccination campaign

properties.name: Infect
properties.description: 2-to-2 interaction that represents infectious contact between two human individuals

properties.name: Disease
properties.description: 1-to-1 interaction that represents a change in th edisease status of a human individual.

properties.name: Strata
properties.description: 1-to-1 interaction that represents a change in the demographic division of a human individual.

properties.name: Vaccinate
properties.description: 2-to-1 interaction that represents an human individual receiving a vaccine dose.

properties.name: Produce Vaccine
properties.description: 0-to-1 interaction that represents the production of a single vaccine dose.
